item.title: procrastination
item.description: + **relevant notes**: [[motivation]] [[addiction]] definition: Procrastination is the action of unnecessarily and voluntarily delaying or postponing something despite knowing that there will be negative consequences for doing so. Oftentimes, it is a habitual human behaviour. â€” Procrastination - Wikipedia Criteria: it must be counterproductive, needless, and delaying
